news.Title: [AI Summary] 精材2025年9月合併營收年增10.26%
news.Content:
精材(3374.TWO)於2025年10月9日公告其2025年9月合併營收。根據Yahoo奇摩股市報導，精材2025年9月合併營收為新台幣7.68億元，較去年同期成長10.26%。去年同期營收為新台幣6.96億元，增加金額為新台幣7150萬元。

累計至2025年9月，精材本年累計合併營收為新台幣51.72億元，較去年同期減少1.5%。去年同期累計合併營收為新台幣52.51億元，減少金額為新台幣7901萬元。該公告並未提供營收增長或減少的原因分析，僅呈現了相關數據。投資者可根據此營收數據，結合其他市場資訊和公司公告，評估精材的營運狀況。

news.Title: [AI Summary] Xintec's September 2025 Consolidated Revenue Increased by 10.26% Year-Over-Year
news.Content:
• Xintec announced a 10.26% year-over-year increase in consolidated revenue for September 2025, reaching NT$768.35 million, potentially signaling positive growth momentum and impacting investor sentiment.
• Xintec's year-to-date consolidated revenue through September 2025 decreased by 1.5% compared to the same period last year, totaling NT$5.17 billion, which could raise concerns about overall performance and potentially affect stock valuation.
